item.title: Need Command Coding Help

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:3, topic:444874”]if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 3){

Does that not work?[/quote]

@OP: This ^ should work.

PIEBAR2FAR:

make 2 separate commands, change one to ::item and one to ::pickup, have the pickup command be for admins only and the item command be for owner/co only

That would be quite illogical when you can just use the ‘or’ operator.

item.title: Need Command Coding Help
item.dc:creator: @silicoofficial silicoofficial
item.description:
@silicoofficial wrote:

Okay, so I have four player rights. 1 = Moderator, 2 = Administrator, 3 = Co-Owner/Owner, and 4 = Super Player/Donator. I want to make my ::pickup command only accessible by player rights 2 and 3. The original line of code for this command made the command accessible by player rights 2, 3, and 4. That’s why I changed it to how it is now (only accessible by administrators.) But I don’t know how to make it available to Administrators and owners! This is the current coding for the command.

[sup] }

    if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights == 2){
	        String[] args = command.split(" ");[/sup]

If anyone could please help me, it would be much appreciated. Thanks.

P.S. If this helps at all, I’m using a Delta source.

Read full topic
